message.content: {"id": "2940", "title": "Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor", "description": "There is a delay of approximately 30 seconds when updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature. The bug report suggests that a busy cursor should be shown during this time.", "OB": "Currently, there is no indication to the user that the table is being updated, resulting in confusion and frustration.", "EB": "The checkboxes should trigger a busy cursor when the state is being updated, providing visual feedback to the user.", "SR": "Implement the use of a busy cursor when updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature to improve the user experience."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

', 'OB': 'It takes a log time ( 30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table Busy cursor should be shownNOTES: ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
